channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish, 26th September
item.description:
Rubbish

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Finsbury Park Avenue, Harringay, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing Sign, 26th September
item.description:
Instead of fixing sign so it was put up straight and securely it has been ‘Totally Removed” This sign was put up to stop traffic coming down cul-de-sac at high speed and then reversing backwards when they missed the turning in this very narrow road, thinking it is a cut through to Bromley Common. The traffic has now increased since the removal of the site, causing danger, noise and unnecessary pollution. Please refit sign as soon as possible, before there is an accident or someone injured in cul-de-sac !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parkfield Way, Southborough, London
Report on FixMyStreet
